name: Frulia.pl
tag_list: frulia, business, articles, press-releases, events, jobs, pr-agencies, companies
overview:
Frulia.pl service was to help publishers access to the materials, while the companies and PR agencies to offer new tool for distributing valuable content. Apart from our service you lose the ability to create quick and free transfer to other Internet users about your e-business.

Restricts you only your time and creativity!

The service can be divided into four sections: Articles, startups, job offers and events. Each user creates the community of our site may contribute to its content by adding new content sections. Get news published through RSS and track about what’s happening in our service.

For Publishers

If you are looking for content for your website or magazine, you can freely use the information contained on the pages Frulia.pl, unless it is clearly indicated by the lack of rights to reprint.

For Agency PR

Our service is also a tool that will be suitable for those who are looking for places to enable them to publish advertising materials. You can submit your site or company evaluated and show it others.

Join the community service Frulia.pl an account you will be able to participate actively adding new content to the site.
